A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Complete and utter let-down. It felt like a movie that had Star Wars references rather than an actual Star Wars film. This film managed to completely detach itself from the saga by ruining the image of the old characters and by adding really boring side stories. You cannot feel sympathy or hate towards any new characters because their back stories are weak or non existent. Also\, what's with the constant jokes Disney? The only good thing was the special effects.
